    DefaultContextSchedulableControllerAction
    An action that takes a ContextSchedulableDescriptor and schedules it using ISchedule.scheduleIterable(ScheduleParameters, Iterable, String, boolean, Object...).
    DefaultSchedulableAction
    An action that takes a SchedulableDescriptor and will schedule it to the model's schedule.

    A Controller action that executes based on a Descriptor.
